name: Telegram Google bot
description: Telegram Google bot allows to you to perform simple search in Google via Telegram if Google is not available directly

TELEGRAMBOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot secret key in form `NNNNNNN:$0meR@nd0mChars`. If you have no one, please, obtain it with https://t.me/BotFather

SECRET_TOKEN.description: A secret key for verifying that requests are coming from telegram servers
